attributes.action: petrol price is mad lets make a stand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
******LETS MAKE A STAND*********
this country is going mad at the pumps we now pay over £1 at the pump we got to bring it down if we where french this would b a riot i hear sep 2000 is comeing back for another go on 1/12/2007 i know this e-petition is going to do nothing the gov just will not lissen 
******LETS MAKE A STAND*********

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
